original_text: Just as Paul was about to speak, Gallio said to them, “If you Jews were making a complaint about some misdemeanor or serious crime, it would be reasonable for me to listen to you.
korean_text: 바울이 입을 열고자 할 때에 갈리오가 유대인들에게 이르되 너희 유대인들아 만일 이것이 무슨 부정한 일이나 불량한 행동이었으면 내가 너희 말을 들어 주는 것이 옳거니와

sentences.original_text: Just as Paul was about to speak
If you Jews were making a complaint
about some misdemeanor or serious crime
it would be reasonable for me to listen to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 듣는 것이 합당할 것이다
